name: Wild Companion
trigger: when you expend a spell slot or a use of Wild Shape to summon a nature spirit
effects: you cast Find Familiar without material components
the familiar is Fey and disappears when you finish a long rest
limits: requires expending a spell slot or a use of Wild Shape
